select * from company_position cp join company_info ci on cp.company_info_id = ci.id where 1 = 1
and cp.company_info_id = #{companyPositionVO.companyPosition.companyInfoId}
and ci.area like concat('%',#{companyPositionVO.companyInfo.area},'%')
and ci.stage like concat('%',#{companyPositionVO.companyInfo.stage},'%')
and ci.scale like concat('%',#{companyPositionVO.companyInfo.scale},'%')
and ci.industry like concat('%',#{companyPositionVO.companyInfo.industry},'%')
LIMIT #{pageStart},#{pageSize}
